    • Method Detail

      • Singleton

        public static UsersList Singleton()
        Method for the singleton pattern
        Returns:
        The singleton instance of the UsersList

      • loadUsersList

        private void loadUsersList()
        This private method is used to load the list of registered users from a .csv file when the server is started. If for any reason we are not able to read the file an empty list will be created.

      • check

        public void check(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  Observer observer)
           throws LoginException,
                  IsAlreadyActiveException
        This method is used to perform the login
        Parameters:
        name - The username we want to login with
        password - The password associated to the account
        observer - The client that wants to become an observer
        Throws:
        LoginException - Exception thrown when the login is not successful
        IsAlreadyActiveException - Exception thrown when the username is already connected to the server

      • logOut

        public void logOut(java.lang.String name,
                   Observer observer)
        This method is used to perform the logout of the user
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the user that want to log out
        observer - The Client observer we want to remove from the list list

      • register

        public void register(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String password)
              throws HomonymyException
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new user we want to register
        password - The password of the new user we want to register
        Throws:
        HomonymyException - Exception thrown in case there is already a user registered with the specified name

      • produceSHA256

        private java.lang.String produceSHA256(java.lang.String password)
        Method used to produce the sha256 of a string
        Parameters:
        password - The plain text password we want to hash
        Returns:
        The sha256 of the input password

      • findUser

        public User findUser(java.lang.String name)
              throws UserNotExistentException
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the user we want to try to retrieve
        Returns:
        The user corresponding to the specified name
        Throws:
        UserNotExistentException - Exception thrown when the user doesn't exist on the server

      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String name)
        This method is used for situations where we are sure that the user exists in the server
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the user we want to retrieve
        Returns:
        The user corresponding to the specified name
